      • unsatisfiedResources

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Violation> unsatisfiedResources
        Map {VM_ID, Violation} = Violation per VM, per Time, per Resources Track resources violation per VM, per Time and per resources 
          violation {
      { virtualMachineId = 1,
        { time = 1,
          { cpuViolation = X,
            ramViolation = X,
            netViolation = x }
          }
        }
      }

    • Method Detail

      • runHeuristics

        public static void runHeuristics(Scenario s,
                                 java.lang.Integer code,
                                 java.util.List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines,
                                 java.util.List<VirtualMachine> virtualMachines,
                                 java.util.List<VirtualMachine> derivedVMs,
                                 java.lang.Integer[] requests,
                                 java.lang.Boolean isMigrationActive)
        If Add new VMs request to the Datacenter
        Parameters:
        s - One request of Workload Scenario
        code - Heuristics Code
        physicalMachines - List of Physical Machine
        virtualMachines - List of Virtual Machine
        derivedVMs - List of Derived Virtual Machine
        requests - Requests:
        • Requests[0]: requestServed Number of requests served
        • Requests[1]: requestRejected Number of requests rejected
        • Requests[2]: requestUpdated Number of requests updated
        • Requests[3]: violation Number of violation
        isMigrationActive - Is migration active

      • runHeuristics

        public static void runHeuristics(java.lang.Integer code,
                                 java.util.List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines,
                                 java.util.List<VirtualMachine> virtualMachines,
                                 java.util.List<VirtualMachine> derivedVMs,
                                 java.util.List<VirtualMachine> vmToMigrate)
        Parameters:
        code - Heuristic Code
        physicalMachines - List of Physical Machines
        virtualMachines - List of allocated Virtual Machines
        derivedVMs - List of derived Virtual Machines
        vmToMigrate - List of VM to migrate

      • updatePlacementAfterReconf

        public static Placement updatePlacementAfterReconf(java.util.List<Scenario> workload,
                                                   java.lang.String heuristicCode,
                                                   Placement placement,
                                                   java.lang.Integer startTimeMemeticAlg,
                                                   java.lang.Integer endTimeMemeticAlg)
        Updates Placement After Reconfiguration
        Parameters:
        workload - Workload Trace
        heuristicCode - Heuristic Algorithm
        placement - Placement from the memetic algorithm execution
        startTimeMemeticAlg - Start time of Memetic Algorithm
        endTimeMemeticAlg - End time of Memetic Algorithm
        Returns:
        Placement after Reconfiguration and with all missed request

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Parameter file structure:
        • ALGORITHM = Algorithm Code
        • HEURISTIC_CODE = Heuristic Code
          • FF = First Fit
          • BF = Best Fit
          • WF = Worst Fit
          • FFD = First Fit Decreasing
          • BFD = Best Fit Decreasing
        • PM_CONFIG = Load CPU Configuration
          • LOW
          • MED
          • HIGH
          • FULL
          • SATURATED
        • DERIVE_COST = Cost per each derived VM
        • PROTECTION_FACTOR = Protection Factor
        • INTERVAL_EXECUTION_MEMETIC = Periodic Time of MA Execution
        • POPULATION_SIZE = Population size for MA
        • NUMBER_GENERATIONS = Generations size for MA
        • EXECUTION_DURATION = Time of Duration
        • LINK_CAPACITY = Link Capacity for Migration
        • MIGRATION_FACTOR_LOAD = Factor Load per Migration
        • HISTORICAL_DATA_SIZE = Historical Data Sieze
        • FORECAST_SIZE = Forecast Size
        • SCALARIZATION_METHOD = Scalarization Method
          • - ED = Euclidean Distance
          • - MD = Manhattan Distance
          • - CD = Chevyshev Distance
          • - WS = Weighted Sum
        • SCENARIOS = List of Request
        If you want to add more parameters, changes the loadParameters(ArrayList, String)
        Parameters:
        args - List of arguments (as array)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error managing files
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Multi-thread error
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Multi-thread error

      • loadAprioriValuesByTime

        public static void loadAprioriValuesByTime(java.util.List<Scenario> workload)
        Load the objective function's a priori values from the scenario
        Parameters:
        workload - List of Scenarios

      • isMememeticPlacementBetter

        public static java.lang.Boolean isMememeticPlacementBetter(Placement heuristicPlacement,
                                                           Placement memeticPlacement)
        Parameters:
        heuristicPlacement - Heuristic Placement
        memeticPlacement - Memetic Placement
        Returns:
        True, is Memetic Placement is better than Heuristic Placement
        False, otherwise
